LanguageData.HadGFish.stages.0.label: Fish, salted, something missing.
LanguageData.HadGFish.stages.0.description: I want something to go with the fish
LanguageData.HadGFishAndBear.stages.0.label: Fish and beer, what else do you need for happiness?
LanguageData.HadGFishAndBear.stages.0.description: I feel a surge of energy, I can move mountains, where is the toilet?
LanguageData.HadYzvar.stages.0.label: Natural product
LanguageData.HadYzvar.stages.0.description: Is that a beetle swimming? It's even tastier this way.
